trans-unit.source: Provides data for a focus-changed event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para um evento com foco alterado.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] do objeto que recebeu o foco.

trans-unit.source: The child ID of the object that received focus.
trans-unit.target: A ID filha do objeto que recebeu o foco.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
trans-unit.target: O `idObject` e `idChild` parâmetros contêm o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] objeto identificadores que clientes de automação de interface do usuário podem usar para vincular um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> para um `IAccessible` objeto em um aplicativo de tecnologia de acessibilidade mais antigo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] filho do objeto recebendo o foco.

trans-unit.source: Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application.
trans-unit.target: Objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] são valores de 32 bits que identificam as categorias de objetos acessíveis dentro de um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
trans-unit.target: O `idObject` e `idChild` parâmetros contêm o objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] que os clientes podem usar para vincular um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> para um `IAccessible` objeto em um aplicativo de tecnologia de acessibilidade mais antigo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] do objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.
trans-unit.target: A ID do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elemento que está recebendo o foco.

trans-unit.source: For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os valores possíveis, consulte [identificadores de objeto](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) na documentação do Microsoft Active Accessibility.

trans-unit.source: Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application.
trans-unit.target: Objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] são valores de 32 bits que identificam as categorias de objetos acessíveis dentro de um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
trans-unit.target: O `idObject` e `idChild` parâmetros contêm o objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] que os clientes podem usar para vincular um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> para um `IAccessible` objeto em um aplicativo de tecnologia de acessibilidade mais antigo.
